transcript:
Customer: Haan hello.
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir, Srishti na baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan ji, aap free hai na?
Customer: Haan boliye na.
Executive: Haan, sir aapki aapne mujhe bola tha ki aapko business services nahi mil rahi hai, business nahi mil rahi hai, right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur aapne feedback bhi likha hua hai ki matlab ki kaafi very bad services, don't use this app, app ko bhi use mat karna, fake hai pura. Right? But sir aap agar team ki side se check kiya ja raha hai, aap to buyleads bhi nahi consume kar rahe hain sir. To aapko business kaise provide hoga, services kaise provide hoga?
Customer: Kya karna padega?
Executive: Aap buylead consume kariye aur aap buyleads jab consume karenge wo baat karni hoti hai, buyleads jo aati hai na wo buyer ki hi aati hai.
Executive: Buylead aapko pata hai na kahan se consume hoti hai?
Customer: Mujhe, kahan se mam?
Executive: Hello, aap app use karte hain IndiaMART ka?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: To fir kahan se aap buylead ko check karte hain?
Customer: Ji kya bole mam?
Executive: Buylead sir, buylead IndiaMART ki agar services lete hain to aapko buyer se baat karni hoti hai, customer se baat karni hoti hai, jo kharidar hota hai. Ab kharidar se aap kaise baat karenge? Jab buyleads aayengi, jo IndiaMART aapko business deti hai, kispe deti hai? Buyleads pe deti hai, inquiry pe deti hai, call pe deti hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan, to aapko wo buyleads consume karni hoti hai. Main aapko bata deti hu kahan se aapko buylead milengi, kahan se aapko kharidar ka number milega, kaise unse baat karni rahegi, kaise services milengi.
Executive: Thik hai?
Executive: Dekhiye IndiaMART aise samne se to nahi de dega business jab tak aap nahi baat karenge.
Executive: Ab main hi hu koi product lene aaungi aapse, aap mujhe batayenge na ki ye ye product hai, aise aise product hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Right? Tabhi to business milega.
Executive: Isiliye, ek minute rukiyega, main aapko bata deti hu, pan India deal karte hain na, puri India mein hi to deal karte hain aap?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Ji mam haan.
Executive: Pure India mein deal karte hain na?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek minute rukiyega.
Executive: Ab aap dekhiye aapke paas agar main pure India ki dekh rahi hu, to aapke paas abhi buylead aayi hai, SS safety shoes ki, Baraus Gujarat se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Haan safety shoes ki hai.
Customer: Haan boliye mam.
Executive: Dekhiye aapke paas buylead aa rahi hai, aap app use nahi karte hain na?
Customer: Nahi app use nahi karte mam.
Executive: Website use karte hain IndiaMART ki website?
Customer: IndiaMART ka website, nahi mam.
Executive: Website bhi nahi use karte to aap kaise fir buylead ko consume karenge, aap hi zara bataye.
Customer: To aap bataiye kal ki kya karna padega.
Executive: App ko download kar lijiye, IndiaMART ka jo app hota hai na wo download kariye ya to Google Chrome use karte hain Chrome?
Customer: Chrome hai, Chrome use.
Executive: Haan Chrome par aaiye, type kariye jo main bata rahi hu seller.seller
Customer: Haan.
Executive: seller
Customer: Ji ji ek minute mam ek minute.
Customer: Haan mam Chrome mein gaye.
Executive: Haan seller dot, kispe, kispe gaye aap?
Customer: Ji kya bole mam?
Executive: Kispe, aap Chrome par hai na, Chrome par?
Customer: Haan haan Chrome pe hai.
Executive: Haan seller, seller type kariye s.e.l.l.e.r.
Customer: S.E.
Executive: S.E.L.L.E.R.
Customer: Double L E R.
Executive: Dot.
Customer: Dot.
Executive: IndiaMART i.n.d.i.a.
Customer: IndiaMART in com sil.
Executive: IndiaMART.com.
Customer: .com haan sil.
Executive: Sil.
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: [inaudible]
Executive: Inki aawaz bahut zyada break ho rahi hai.
Customer: Haan mam IndiaMART.
Executive: Open hua? Ab aap us pe apna register mobile number enter karne ka option aa raha hoga.
Customer: Ji. Aapka jo register mobile number hai na last mein hai 634.
Executive: Ye wala number hai na 634 wala?
Customer: 634.
Customer: Haan wo to jaise yahan pe bhai ka hai mera to bhai hai nahi yahan pe.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Jaise wo wala number jo hai mera bhai ka hai, bhai hai nahi abhi.
Executive: Bhai hai nahi? To kab tak wo available rahenge ya unse OTP le sakte hain aap?
Customer: Unse OTP lena, abhi to mam mushkil hai.
Executive: Call se unse pooch lijiye ki IndiaMART ka website on kar raha hu to OTP chahiye.
Customer: Achcha mam mere hum apna number diye hain, thik hai? To usme OTP aaya hai mam.
Executive: Aaya OTP?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To OTP open karne ke baad aapka ye wala account open ho gaya hai? 76 Shiva Enterprises wala.
Customer: Seven.
Customer: Seven six three eight.
Executive: Open hua?
Customer: Ek minute mam haan open to ho gaya mam.
Executive: Shiva Enterprises open hua hai?
Customer: Isme mam mera Gmail aaya hai.
Executive: Sir ab video meet pe join ho sakte hain?
Customer: Ji kya bole mam?
Executive: Video meet pe join ho sakte hain, video call pe?
Customer: Oh video call pe?
Executive: Haan. To mobile to yahi wala hai mam kaise kare? Phone se hi join ho jayiyega phone se hi. Main aapko aapka whatsapp number chalta hai na ispe?
Customer: Haan ispe chalta hai whatsapp number.
Executive: Yahi wala number jis se main call kar rahi hu.
Customer: Ji haan haan.
Executive: To main whatsapp pe aapko link share kar rahi hu, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai. Ek minute rukiyega, ek minute.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Sir maila nahi hai sir, bahut easy ho jata hai, wo aapne use nahi kiya hai na abhi tak isliye dikkat aa rahi hai aapko.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Aapki jo mail ID hai Swavik Dutta 1102002, right?
Customer: Haan mam isme aaya hai samjhe.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Isme jaise abhi hum click kiye na OTP dale to OTP dalne ke baad jo hai ek to ye aaya hai Swavik Swavik Dutta matlab mera Gmail aaya hai isme.
Executive: Shiva Enterprises show hua hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi. Shiva Enterprises show nahi hua hai. Nahi Shiva Enterprises show nahi hua hai. Swavik Dutta ye Gmail humko mera wala dikha raha hai mam.
Executive: Usme gaya hai fir. Aapki aawaz kaafi zyada break ho rahi hai.
Executive: Koi aur number hai jis se baat ho sakti hai, isse kaafi zyada break ho rahi hai aapki voice.
Customer: Haan to number likhiyega mam.
Executive: Haan bataiye.
Customer: 9123.
Executive: 91.
Customer: 23.
Executive: 23.
Customer: 92.
Executive: Haan 9123.
Customer: 92.
Customer: 92.
Customer: 63.
Executive: Ji kya?
Customer: 6363.
Executive: 63.
Customer: 85.
Executive: 63 ke baad?
Customer: 85.
Executive: 85. 9123926385, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Yahi hai na?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye main call kar rahi hu.
Customer: Achcha isko hum dekhte hain.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not getting business from IndiaMART.

- Customer left negative feedback about services.

- Customer not consuming buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to consume buyleads.

- Executive offered to guide via video meet.

- Executive shared a link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on new number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, app, website, whatsapp
